## Project: Course Registration Website
- Next.js with TypeScript (latest version)
- PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM
- Guest role: Submit course registration
- Admin role: Manage registrations

## Project Structure Completed
- ✅ Next.js 15 with App Router
- ✅ TypeScript configuration
- ✅ Tailwind CSS for styling
- ✅ shadcn/ui components (Button, Input, Label, Card, Table, Badge, Select)
- ✅ Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL
- ✅ Guest registration form at /register
- ✅ Admin dashboard at /admin
- ✅ API routes for registration and admin management
- ✅ Authentication with bcryptjs
- ✅ Database schema (Admin, Registration models)
- ✅ README.md with complete documentation
